result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn H Day

defendant.name: Day, Shawn H
defendant.address: 1005 W Main Street, Balsam Lake, WI 54810

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
CASES: 15CF78, 15CF26, 12CM533, 13CF76  Defendant Shawn H Day in court with attorney Nicholas Von Davis.  Defendant Shawn H Day in custody.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 9:53 am 9:55 recess. 10:10am back on the record.  

12CM533: State motion to amend to State Cty DOC. Def- plea of G to amended Cty DOC. CT finds G. $263.50 forfeiture. 

13CF76: Ct 1- Def plea of G. Ct 2- Def plea of G. Ct 5- Def plea of G. CT accepts pleas, finds G, enters JOC. DRI Cts 3 & 4. 

15CF78: Def files Waiver of PH. CT accepts waiver, Def bound over. Info filed. Ct 1- Def plea of G. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. Dismiss Ct 2. 

CT- DRI 15CF26. 

Counsel waives PSI. State req 30 days to establish restitution in 15CF78. 

SENTENCING:

13CF76: I/S on Ct 1 burglary- 12 1/2 yrs, 7 1/2 yrs prob, 138 days cond'l time w/huber, no GT. counsel to determinte sent credit. $290.60 fine/cost. Restititution to Donald and Nancy Derosioer-  $7,450.00. Restitution to Sheriff's Dept for transportation costs- $1,134.46. The total 10% surcharge is $858.45 for a grand total of $9, 442.91. This is  J/S w/Beth Kelly.  $100/mo PP beg 10/1/15 and 1st of e/m thereafter. On Cts 2 & 5- w/h sent, prob 1 yr on both Cts- all prob is concurrent, $265.60 on each misd.  

cannot possess firearms or body armor, cannot vote or hold public office. if not us citizen could be deported. DNA sample. no surcharge on 12 or 13 file. No contact w/ Nancy & Donal Derosier. not to be at 348 230th St Osceola WI 54020.

15CF78: w/h sent, prob 3 yrs- concurrent with probation in 13CF76, 180 days banked to be used by agent if necessary, $290.60 fine/cost, DNA sample & surcharge, No contact w/Jerid Bestul. 30 days to determine restitution amount.  10:44am
from atty Davis - request to appear by phone - DENIED 3/3/15

Attorney Nicholas Von Davis in court.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BJM-clerk 2:16 pm  Br 1 has underlying file.  Atty Davis requesting subsitution be withdrawn.  CT - grants request.  2:18 pm adj.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 9, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
of Assignment of Prosecutor.  Submitted by ADA Dorrance.
and Motion to Dismiss.  Submitted by Atty Davis.
of Judge.  Submitted by Atty Davis.
